testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: Given a web browser is at rs components home page \"http:\/\/uk.rs-online.com\/web\/\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And enters the username as \"naren1306\" and the password as \"test123\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And clicks on the login button to login

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And clicks on New products menu

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And selects the pi-top laptop from new products list

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And confirm the selected product and units

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And clicks on the add to basket button

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And clicks on the view basket button

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: And I will be able to see the checkout page

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: When I clicks on the checkout securely button to checkout

testcase.classname: Scenario: Login user should navigate to payment page to process the order
testcase.name: Then I should able to navigate to the payments page

testcase.classname: Scenario: Invalid track order number should display error notification message
testcase.name: Given a web browser is at rs components home page \"http:\/\/uk.rs-online.com\/web\/\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: Invalid track order number should display error notification message
testcase.name: And entered invalid track order number \"2145abcd\" in the rs order number search field

testcase.classname: Scenario: Invalid track order number should display error notification message
testcase.name: When I click on the track order button

testcase.classname: Scenario: Invalid track order number should display error notification message
testcase.name: Then i will be navigate to parcel tracking page

testcase.classname: Scenario: Invalid track order number should display error notification message
testcase.name: And i should able to see error notification message \"No orders matched your search criteria\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: User can search and process the order through quick order feature
testcase.name: Given a web browser is at rs components home page \"http:\/\/uk.rs-online.com\/web\/\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: User can search and process the order through quick order feature
testcase.name: And entered the product code \"884-1310\" in the rs stock number search field

testcase.classname: Scenario: User can search and process the order through quick order feature
testcase.name: When I click on the add to basket button

testcase.classname: Scenario: User can search and process the order through quick order feature
testcase.name: Then I will be able to see the checkout page

testcase.classname: Scenario: User can search and process the order through quick order feature
testcase.name: And I should able see product the product code \"RS Stock No. 884-1310\"
